description:
What sunglasses are best for that mug of yours? It all depends on the shape of your visage and finding a proportional style of sunnies to fit the bill. Ahead, our guide on choosing the right frames to suit your face.你最适合戴哪种墨镜？这需要根据你的脸型来搭配。下面，我们将指导你找到适合你的墨镜形状。

1.The Emma Stone (AKA Round) Face Shape“艾玛·斯通式脸型”（又称圆脸）

Rounder faces like Emma's tend to be widest across the cheekbones and narrower along the forehead and jawline. Rectangular and angular frames are always a safe bet, and the wide cheekbones can pull off oversized frames, too. 此类脸型通常面颊骨宽大，但前额和下巴较窄。这种脸型的人最好选择矩形或棱角分明的墨镜。他们宽大的脸颊骨也可以驾驭特大框的墨镜。

2.The Angelina Jolie (AKA Square) Face Shape“安吉丽娜·朱莉式”脸型（又称方脸 ）

With her square shape, Jolie's visage looks best paired with rounded frames that soften her angular features.方形脸的人最好佩戴圆框眼镜来中和其棱角分明的脸颊。

3.Jennifer Lawrence has an oval face, giving her plenty of options when it comes to frame shape: from borrowed-from-the-boys silhouettes to retro rounded styles. 詹妮弗·劳伦斯的脸型为鹅蛋型，这种脸型可驾驭多种样式的墨镜。不论是男生气十足的剪影式，还是复古的圆形墨镜，这种脸型的人都可以驾驭。

4.Kerry Washington has a heart-shaped mug, where her face is broader at the top and is more pointed at the chin.This means angles of all kinds and wide, upturned frames are her friends.凯丽·华盛顿的脸型是心形，由于这种脸型有着上宽下窄的特点，它适合各种宽大有棱角以及翻转式的墨镜。

（翻译：进击的Meredith）

声明：本双语文章的中文翻译系沪江英语原创内容，转载请注明出处。中文翻译仅代表译者个人观点，仅供参考。如有不妥之处，欢迎指正。

title: 你的脸型适合什么眼镜？让明星们来教你~
